seller_description: SOFTSPUN multipurpose microfiber cloths deliver superior cleaning performance with ultra-absorbent, lint-free, and scratch-free material, making them ideal for drying and polishing without damaging surfaces. Crafted from premium-quality microfiber (80% Polyester and 20% Polyamide), these reusable cloths are soft, durable, and more effective than cotton or chamois. Designed for versatile use, they are perfect for cleaning vehicle interiors and exteriors, kitchen surfaces, glass, electronics, mirrors, and more—without requiring chemicals. Available in a convenient pack of four medium-sized cloths (16 x 16) with additional size and combo options, these cloths feature rounded, securely stitched corners for durability SOFTSPUN has maintained consistent quality since 2015, addressing common issues like stitch unraveling Care instructions: wash new cloths before use, avoid washing with other fabrics, do not iron, and avoid using chemicals.
review: This product is not good. at all This product is very small It is not what was shown in the photo yah.
expected_output: From a neutral standpoint, the seller’s images and description present a pack of gray microfiber cloths measuring 16 x 16 inches, emphasizing durability and lint-free performance. The buyer’s photograph appears consistent in color and stitching style, yet they complain that the product is much smaller than depicted and generally “not good.” While it is unclear if the actual dimensions are indeed different from those advertised, the buyer’s dissatisfaction centers on size and quality rather than a clear misrepresentation of features. Therefore, the product seems to align with the seller’s general claims, indicating the buyer’s dissatisfaction may stem more from personal expectations than from seller fault.
label: -1: Buyer's opinion
